data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - Solitary Sniper Weapons Pack
data.detailed_description:
Wreak long-range devastation with the Solitary Sniper DLC Weapon Pack. Featuring three diverse but equally deadly sniper rifles - the PR15 HERA, LSSR SOKIL 4 and XG Dawen - this is sniping at its very best!

Featuring:
  • PR15 HERA - The only semi-automatic regular sniper rifle in-game, it’s time to unleash uninterrupted fury
  • LSSR SOKIL 4 - Featuring the fastest reload of all sniper rifles in-game, don’t give the enemy a second to react
  • XG Dawen - The only medium sniper rifle with a bipod, it features enhanced stability while also greatly reducing stamina drain

*Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
